identity.name: The Roast Terminal
identity.vibe: Underground Comedy Club meets Hacker Terminal. Dark, gritty, high-contrast, and unapologetic.
principles: Fusion: Stand-up Comedy Stage (Spotlights) + Glitch Art (Terminal text).
Content: The Roast is the hero. Text must be legible but stylized.
Contrast: Pure Black backgrounds vs. Neon Orange/Red highlights.

body.usage: Roast text, inputs, metadata, terminal logs.

usage_rules: Primary color (#FF2E00) is for 'Dangerous' actions (Generate Roast).
Secondary color (#7000FF) is for 'Tech' elements (AI processing).
Borders should be subtle (#1F1F1F) unless active/focused (#FF2E00).

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A) for results page. Single column 'Spotlight' for Home.
layout.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for containers. Gap-6 for grids.
layout.containers: Sharp edges (rounded-none) or minimal rounded-sm. No pill shapes.
layout.alignment: Center-aligned Hero (The Stage). Left-aligned Roast Text (The Script).

buttons.style: Sharp edges, uppercase text, hover:glitch effect.
buttons.classes: rounded-none border-2 border-primary bg-transparent text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-100 font-mono uppercase tracking-widest

inputs.classes: h-16 text-xl bg-black border-b-2 border-white/20 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-none font-mono placeholder:text-white/20

cards.classes: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/10 p-6 relative overflow-hidden

visual_enhancers.textures: Use grain overlays on the background to avoid 'flat' black.
effects: Glitch effect on hover for interactive elements.
CRT Scanline overlay (optional, low opacity) for the 'Terminal' feel.
Neon glow (box-shadow) on the primary button.
visual_enhancers.animations: Typewriter effect for the roast text generation. It must feel like it's being written live.

images.description: Dark grunge metal texture for background overlay (low opacity).
Abstract neon fire for the 'Roast' visual metaphor.
Microphone in dark setting for the audio player section.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with sharp strokes. Icons: Flame, Mic, Share2, Download, Skull.

instructions_to_main_agent.general: You are building a 'Roast' app. The UI should feel slightly aggressive but fun. Do not use 'friendly' rounded corners. Use sharp, brutalist geometry.
instructions_to_main_agent.hinglish_support: Ensure the font 'Space Mono' supports basic Latin characters. Hinglish is just English characters, so no special font needed, but the *vibe* of the text is key.
instructions_to_main_agent.loading_states: Instead of 'Loading...', use roast-themed messages like 'Stalking their profile...', 'Finding cringe content...', 'Preparing emotional damage...'.
instructions_to_main_agent.audio_player: Create a custom audio player. Do not use the default browser <audio> tag. It must look like a waveform visualizer.
instructions_to_main_agent.file_structure: Use .js files for React components as per the project setup. Do not use .tsx.

universal_guidelines.interactions: Every button must have a hover state. Use 'transform: scale(1.02)' or color shifts.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is high. The primary red (#FF2E00) should be used for large text or buttons, not small body text.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to the Input field ('linkedin-url-input'), the Generate button ('generate-roast-btn'), and the Audio Player ('roast-audio-player').
